additional_buffs.description: Max value of Spirit Awakening increases by 5 each per Senior Pilot. (However, this value cannot exceed 25).
additional_buffs.name: Spirit Awakening Limit Break

buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases by 10 for all units. ([Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. Can also be activated in the Time Shop).
buffs.name: Spirit Awakening

hidden_abilites: When first appearing, the movement speed and attack speed of ally units are significantly increased for a period of time.
Does not attack ground melee units.
Increases movement speed, attack speed, and critical hit damage of all units by 4%.
Spirit Awakening Limit Break: Max value of Spirit Awakening increases by 5 each per Senior Pilot. (However, this value cannot exceed 25.)
description.skill2: Increase critical damage of human unit in Guild Raid (5.4%, 10.8%, 16.2%, 21.6%, 27%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Pilot ]
